## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                  | Type     | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `link`     | `link`      | URL for link attached to the Brand           | `string` | `'/'`       |
| `name`     | `name`      | Your Brand, (default to 'Brand')             | `string` | `'Brand'`   |
| `scale`    | `scale`     | The scale of the brand, (default to 1)       | `number` | `1`         |
| `withText` | `with-text` | (optional) Display along with the Brand Text | `string` | `undefined` |
